principal.name: Kenny Kim
principal.quote: When students develop the power to think for themselves, grades naturally follow.
bio: With over 15 years of experience in education, I've seen firsthand how understanding-based learning transforms students.
My journey began at Columbia University, where I studied the science of learning and developed my philosophy of education.
At Newton School, we don't just prepare students for tests – we prepare them for life.
